title: Lizzie Cundy, 51, puts on a brave face as she steps following split from Jeremy Gordeno
text:
She announced her split from her boyfriend of 10 months Jeremy Gordeno on Friday.

However Lizzie Cundy didn't let her romantic woes get her down, as she put on a brave face while attending Caudwell Childrens Ladies Luncheon later in the day.

The TV personality, 51, looked elegant in a pretty white lace dress with semi-sheer detailing, while keeping it sexy by putting her toned pins on full display.

Staying strong: Lizzie Cundy didn't let her romantic woes get her down, as she put on a brave face while attending Caudwell Childrens Ladies Luncheon later in the day

She layered her lacy number with a quirky white netted jacket, which featured a structured collar and cuff detailing around the wrist.

Lizzie styled her all white look with a pair of strappy nude sandals, which offered her petite frame some added inches in height.

The socialite kept her look glamorous by styling her brunette tresses in a loose waves, while opting for a full face of make-up.

Glam: The TV personality, 51, looked elegant in a pretty white lace dress with semi-sheer detailing, while keeping it sexy by putting her toned pins on full display

Lizzie was introduced to the businessman Jeremy, 53, through a mutual friend in a Weybridge wine bar and the romance flourished from there however it was revealed on Friday that the pair had parted ways.

Lizzie told MailOnline: 'I ended it. I want nothing more to do with him. I'm shocked and horrified by recent events'.

Lizzie and Jeremy were last pictured together at last month's National Reality TV Awards, in what was thought to have been their final date.

Their tumultuous romance was hurtled into the spotlight in May when his ex, Candice Hodge, locked horns with Lizzie during a photoshoot at Jeremy's home in Hampshire, with the ructions leading to a subsequent police investigation.

Shock: Lizzie split from nightlife entrepreneur Jeremy after a 10-month relationship (pictured together at last month's National Reality TV Awards 2019)

Still smiling: She layered her lacy number with a quirky white netted jacket, which featured a structured collar and cuff detailing around the wrist

Following on from the drama, 'shocked and horrified' Lizzie has now confirmed the couple have ended their romance.

Meanwhile, Jeremy released a lengthy statement to MailOnline on Friday, praising 'fun and beautiful Lizzie'.

He said: 'I will always be very fond of Lizzie but events outside our control put our relationship under huge strain. I have come to realise it’s best we stay just friends.

Work it: Lizzie styled her all white look with a pair of strappy nude sandals, which offered her petite frame some added inches in height

'The last few months have been like a soap opera. Lizzie and I have been the innocent victim of some wild and false accusations. Life with Lizzie is tremendous fun...

'We got on really well from the word go. We didn’t stop laughing for weeks. Our friend told Lizzie before we met, "Jeremy will cheer you up" and I hope I did. She's not only beautiful but great company.

'Lizzie's a super girl who is loads of fun. I wish her all the best for the future and hope we can stay good pals.'

Sophisticated: Nell McAndrew looked stylish in a black belted midi dress

Their row in May threw a serious spanner into the romance after Lizzie became locked in an explosive row with Candice.

At the time, the WAG confessed she was stunned when she was posing for an OK! Magazine shoot alongside Jeremy at his mansion before Candice arrived to discover and confront the duo over their union.

Speaking to The Sun, Candice revealed she branded Lizzie a 'f**king whore' in the showdown, as she explained: 'All the cameras were around her. I don’t normally swear but I couldn’t help myself. I shouted, "You f***ing whore!".'

Chic: Elen Rivas cut a stylish figure in a Balmain T-shirt and leather skirt

Clearly heartbroken, Candice claimed Jeremy had revealed he wanted to start a family with her. They have been a couple since 2016 but friends of Jeremy say he broke off the relationship before romancing Lizzie.

After the nightclub owner proposed in Italy, she revealed she had made the shocking discovery of his romance with Lizzie.

She said: 'I felt everything crumble around me. I couldn’t believe what I was seeing and I couldn’t believe he was telling me to leave and not her. We have been through so much together.

'I was crying. I said to him, ‘Three years and you treat me like this for her?’ As I was leaving I said, ‘He asked me to marry me, we have been looking for rings, why have you done this?’.'
